title: Char 2C
description: The Char 2C was a heavy landship tank produced before the Second World War
history: It served with the French Army and featured a very large number of crew members

variants.name: Char 2C
variants.description: Super heavy tank made by FCM, originally made for the First World War

variants.name: Char 2C Bis
variants.description: Modified Char 2C replacing the main gun with a 155 mm howitzer

variants.name: Char 2C Surblindé
variants.description: Up-armored version of the Char 2C meant to counter German anti-tank guns
